00031 ImageManager::ImageManager(QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00032 {
00033     //setModal(true);
00034     setupUi(this);
00035 
00036     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00037     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00038 
00039     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00040         libq4wine.load();
00041     }
00042 
00043     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00044     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00045     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00046 
00047     // Creating database classes
00048     db_image = new Image();
00049 
00050     loadThemeIcons(CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString());
00051 
00052     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00053     connect(tableImage, SIGNAL(customContextMenuRequested(const QPoint &)), this, SLOT(tableImage_showContextMenu(const QPoint &)));
00054     connect(tableImage, SIGNAL(clicked(const QModelIndex &)), this, SLOT(update_lblPathInfo(const QModelIndex &)));
00055 
00056     getCDImages();
00057     return;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void ImageManager::update_lblPathInfo(const QModelIndex){
00061 
00062     if (tableImage->currentRow()<0)
00063         return;
00064     lblPathInfo->setText(tr("File path: %1").arg(db_image->getPath(tableImage->item(tableImage->currentRow(), 0)->text())));
00065 
00066     return;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void ImageManager::tableImage_showContextMenu(const QPoint){
00070     QMenu menu(this);
00071     menu.addAction(actionAdd);
00072     menu.addAction(actionRename);
00073     menu.addSeparator();
00074     menu.addAction(actionRefresh);
00075     menu.addSeparator();
00076     if (tableImage->currentRow()>=0){
00077         actionRemove->setEnabled(TRUE);
00078     } else {
00079         actionRemove->setEnabled(FALSE);
00080     }
00081     menu.addAction(actionRemove);
00082     menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
00083     return;
00084 }

00086 
00087 void ImageManager::getCDImages(void){
00088     qint64 size = 0;
00089     QList<QStringList> result = db_image->getFields();
00090 
00091     int numRows = tableImage->rowCount();
00092     int curRows = 0;
00093 
00094     for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00095         curRows++;
00096 
00097         if (curRows>numRows){
00098             tableImage->insertRow (numRows);
00099             numRows = tableImage->rowCount();
00100         }
00101 
00102         QFile file (result.at(i).at(1));
00103         if (file.exists ()){
00104             size = file.size() / 1024 / 1024;
00105         } else {
00106             size = 0;
00107         }
00108 
00109         if (tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)){
00110             tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setText(result.at(i).at(0));
00111             tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 1)->setText(tr("%1 Mb").arg(size));
00112                 if (!file.exists ()){
00113                     tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setIcon (QIcon(":/data/important.png"));
00114                 } else {
00115                     tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setIcon (QIcon());
00116                 }
00117         } else {
00118             QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(result.at(i).at(0));
00119             tableImage->setItem(curRows - 1, 0, newItem);
00120             if (!file.exists ()){
00121                 newItem->setIcon ( QIcon(":/data/important.png") );
00122             } else {
00123                 newItem->setIcon ( QIcon() );
00124             }
00125             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00126             newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("%1 Mb").arg(size));
00127             tableImage->setItem(curRows - 1, 1, newItem);
00128             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00129         }
00130     }
00131 
00132     numRows = tableImage->rowCount();
00133 
00134     if (numRows > curRows)
00135         for (int i=curRows; i <= numRows; i++)
00136             tableImage->removeRow(curRows);
00137 
00138     tableImage->resizeRowsToContents();
00139     tableImage->resizeColumnsToContents();
00140     tableImage->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00141 
00142     return;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void ImageManager::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00146     QPixmap pixmap;
00147 
00148     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/iso_manager.png").arg(themePath))){
00149         pixmap.load(":data/iso_manager.png");
00150     }
00151 
00152     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00153 
00154     managerToolBar = new QToolBar(tlbManager);
00155 
00156     actionAdd = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/add.png", themePath), tr("Add image"));
00157     connect(actionAdd, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionAddImage()));
00158 
00159     actionRename = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/configure.png", themePath), tr("Rename image"));
00160     connect(actionRename, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionRenameImage()));
00161 
00162     managerToolBar->addSeparator ();
00163 
00164     actionRemove = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/remove.png", themePath), tr("Remove image"));
00165     connect(actionRemove, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionRemoveImage()));
00166 
00167     managerToolBar->addSeparator ();
00168 
00169     actionRefresh = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/reload.png", themePath), tr("Refresh image list"));
00170     connect(actionRefresh, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionRefreshImageList()));
00171 
00172     return;
00173 }
00174 
00175 void ImageManager::cmdOk_Click(){
00176     accept();
00177     return;
00178 }

00180 
00181 void ImageManager::actionAddImage(){
00182     bool ok;
00183     QString fileName, newName;
00184     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00185         fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO or NRG Image file"), QDir::homePath(), tr("iso and nrg files (*.iso *.nrg)"));
00186     #endif
00187 
00188     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00189         fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO Image file"), QDir::homePath(), tr("iso files (*.iso)"));
00190     #endif
00191 
00192     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00193         newName = fileName.split("/").last();
00194         while (db_image->isExistsByName(newName)){
00195             newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems CD iamge already exists."), tr("Sorry. It seems CD image file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel add image operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, fileName.split("/").last() , &ok);
00196             if (!ok){
00197                 return;
00198             }
00199         }
00200         if (!db_image->addImage(newName, fileName))
00201             return;
00202         actionRefreshImageList();
00203     }
00204     return;
00205 }
00206 
00207 void ImageManager::actionRenameImage(){
00208     if (tableImage->currentRow()==-1)
00209         return;
00210 
00211     bool ok;
00212     QString newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new name"), tr("Enter new name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, tableImage->item(tableImage->currentRow(), 0)->text(), &ok);
00213     while (db_image->isExistsByName(newName)){
00214         newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems CD iamge already exists."), tr("Sorry. It seems CD image file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel add image operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, newName, &ok);
00215         if (!ok){
00216             return;
00217         }
00218     }
00219     if (!db_image->renameImage(newName, tableImage->item(tableImage->currentRow(), 0)->text()))
00220         return;
00221     actionRefreshImageList();
00222     return;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void ImageManager::actionRemoveImage(){
00226     if (tableImage->currentRow()==-1)
00227         return;
00228     if (!db_image->delImage(tableImage->item(tableImage->currentRow(), 0)->text()))
00229         return;
00230     actionRefreshImageList();
00231     return;
00232 }
00233 
00234 void ImageManager::actionRefreshImageList(){
00235     getCDImages();
00236     return;
00237 }
00238 
00239 QIcon ImageManager::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00240     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00241     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00242     QIcon icon;
00243     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00244         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00245         if (icon.isNull()){
00246             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00247         }
00248     } else {
00249         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00250     }
00251     return icon;
00252 }
